user_instruction: 'Send an email to Sarah Thompson (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) with the additional information she requested for my job application. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{
  "to": [
    "sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com"
  ],
  "subject": "Additional Information for Job Application – John Doe",
  "body": "Hi Sarah,

Thank you for letting me know what was needed to move forward with my application.

As requested, please find the requested information below:

1. Updated Resume
   – A PDF copy of my latest resume is attached for your review.

2. Professional References
   – Jane Smith – Manager, Google – jane.smith@google.com
   – Mike Johnson – Senior Developer, Facebook – mike.johnson@fb.com
   – Emily Davis – Team Lead, Apple – emily.davis@apple.com

3. Certifications
   – AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
   – Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

If you need any additional materials or have questions, please let me know and I will be happy to provide them.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
John Doe
john.doe@gmail.com"
}
